refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: w=blackman(N) returns an N-point symmetric Blackman window in a column vector w w=blackman(N,sflag) Returns an N point Blackman window using the type of sampling specified by sflag sflag can be either 'symmetric' (default) or 'periodic' (used in spectral analysis) Example w=blackman(4) w =
